ISSUE.TITLE: ProductAttributeValues: use percenatge with a value of 0 is displayed differently in product and cart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.x Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Open the following product in the backend: "adidas Consortium Campus 80s Running Shoes" 2. Navigate to the product attributes section 3. Edit the Size ProductAttribute 4. Edit the first value "8" and select "Use percentage, and leave the value as "0" and save 5. Open the same product in the frontend 6. Select the size "8" ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/54266094/09708f06-4e34-43a4-8257-b6fe03560bf7) 7. And add that product to the cart. 8. Navigate to the cart ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/54266094/083b0180-8181-44b8-ad20-db8f44dc4a09) The 0% is displayed in the product details page, but not in the cart. The behavior should be consisted in both places
